Spacious poker room with regular tournaments.

history.title: About Casino New Brunswick
history.description1: Casino New Brunswick stands out for its generous jackpots, attractive bonuses, and frequent promotions, making it a top destination for gaming enthusiasts.
history.description2: Casino New Brunswick is a modern entertainment destination combining gaming, comfort, and leisure. Guests can enjoy a spacious casino with a variety of slots and table games. The resort features a stylish hotel with amenities for relaxation and business. Restaurants and bars offer delicious cuisine and refreshing drinks.
history.description3: The event center hosts live shows and exciting performances. The casino provides a high level of service and a safe gaming environment. Visitors can experience thrill and entertainment all in one place. Its convenient location makes it easily accessible for tourists and locals. Casino New Brunswick is the perfect spot for unforgettable experiences and vibrant leisure.

customHtml.title: Casino New Brunswick: Style, Atmosphere and Unique Features
customHtml.description:
Casino New Brunswick is more than just a gaming venue; it’s a modern entertainment resort where style and comfort meet excitement and unforgettable experiences. The interior boasts elegant contemporary design, creating an atmosphere of luxury and relaxation. Spacious gaming halls, soft lighting, and thoughtful layout ensure maximum comfort for every guest.


The casino operates daily, offering flexible hours for gaming enthusiasts and entertainment seekers. Visitors can enjoy a wide selection of slot machines and table games, as well as a dedicated poker room hosting regular tournaments.


For culinary lovers, the resort features several bars and restaurants. Hub City Pub offers a diverse menu and sports bar ambiance, while Buffet Experience serves dishes from various world cuisines. Signature cocktails and snacks in stylish bars provide the perfect setting to unwind after gaming.


The Casino New Brunswick hotel is a four-star property with spacious rooms, modern amenities, and a relaxing spa area. Guests can stay for a weekend getaway or host business meetings while enjoying premium service. The resort is also famous for its event center, which hosts live shows, concerts, and special events, creating a festive atmosphere.


Special attention is given to bonus programs and loyalty rewards. New players receive welcome offers, while regular guests enjoy exclusive benefits, including extra credits, discounts, and access to private events. Casino New Brunswick ensures every visit is not only entertaining but also rewarding.


Casino New Brunswick: Language and Financial Services

The staff at Casino New Brunswick is dedicated to providing exceptional service and comfort for all guests. English is the primary language spoken, but many employees also speak French, reflecting the cultural diversity of the region. This ensures smooth communication for both international visitors and Canadian guests.


The casino offers a wide range of payment methods for maximum convenience. Guests can use major credit and debit cards as well as cash. Loyalty programs allow regular players to redeem accumulated rewards for gaming and other services, adding extra value to their experience.


ATMs are available throughout the property for quick cash withdrawals. Currency exchange services are also provided, which is particularly helpful for international travelers. These amenities guarantee flexibility and ease, allowing guests to focus on entertainment without financial concerns.


Casino New Brunswick strives to create a safe and convenient environment for every visitor. From multilingual staff to diverse payment options, every detail is designed to make your stay enjoyable and stress-free.


Casino New Brunswick Rules: Comfort and Safety

Casino New Brunswick ensures every visit is enjoyable and secure. A dress code is in place to maintain the stylish atmosphere of the venue. Guests are encouraged to wear neat and presentable clothing, avoiding sportswear and overly revealing outfits. This creates a comfortable environment for all visitors.


Entry conditions include an age restriction — only adults are allowed inside. A valid ID must be presented upon arrival. The casino promotes responsible gaming, so individuals showing signs of severe intoxication may be denied entry.


Certain prohibitions are enforced for safety and comfort. Weapons, illegal substances, and outside alcoholic beverages are strictly forbidden. Photography of gaming tables without staff permission is also prohibited.


For convenience, the property offers ample parking space. Visitors can easily reach the casino via the Trans-Canada Highway or use taxi and public transportation. Its prime location makes access simple and hassle-free.


Dress Code

  • • Neat attire, no sportswear
  • • Avoid overly revealing outfits

Entry Conditions

  • • Adults only
  • • Valid ID required

Prohibitions

  • • Weapons, drugs, outside alcohol
  • • No gaming table photography without permission

Parking and Access

  • • Free spacious parking
  • • Easy access via highway and taxi


Casino New Brunswick Loyalty Program: Rewards Club

The loyalty program at Casino New Brunswick is called Rewards Club, designed to make every visit more rewarding. Members earn points for playing slots and table games, which can be redeemed for gaming credits, dining, merchandise, or special event access. The program offers exclusive perks, including access to private promotions, discounts, and personalized offers.


Registration is quick and free. Guests simply present valid photo ID at the guest services desk and complete a short form. After signing up, players receive a Rewards Club card to track points during gameplay.


The program features two tiers: the basic level and Ruby Rewards Club Card. All members start at the basic level, and to reach Ruby status, players must accumulate 35,000 points within 13 months. Points are earned at a rate of 1 point per CAD wagered on slots. Higher tiers unlock more benefits, such as exclusive bonuses, VIP event invitations, and additional discounts.


Rewards include welcome offers, monthly promotions, special tournaments, and the ability to redeem points for gaming credits. For example, new members can receive up to CAD 500 in bonuses and free spins on popular slots. Regular players enjoy access to private promotions and personalized deals.


Registration Requirements

  • • Must be 19 or older
  • • Present valid photo ID
  • • Complete a membership form at guest services

Program Tiers

  • • Basic Level — available immediately after registration
  • • Ruby Rewards Club Card — requires 35,000 points in 13 months (approx. CAD 35,000 in slot play)

Bonuses and Benefits

  • • Welcome bonus up to CAD 500
  • • Free spins on featured slots
  • • Monthly promotions and tournaments
  • • Discounts on dining and merchandise
  • • VIP invitations to exclusive events

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Casino New Brunswick
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses and Special Offers at Casino New Brunswick

Casino New Brunswick offers guests not only exciting games but also a wide range of bonuses, special deals, and seasonal events that make every visit unique. Regular promotions for slot enthusiasts and table game players are complemented by festive programs tied to holidays and themed celebrations. The casino ensures that winnings and rewards become part of an unforgettable experience.


Players can enjoy generous offers, including free spins, extra gaming credits, and exclusive jackpots. Seasonal events such as New Year’s parties or summer festivals feature special raffles and giveaways. Additionally, the casino hosts tournaments with impressive prize pools, attracting both beginners and seasoned players.


These offers are available to all guests, creating extra motivation to play and increasing chances of winning. Casino New Brunswick focuses on making every visit not only entertaining but also rewarding.


Gaming Bonuses

  • • Free spins on popular slots (up to 50 spins)
  • • Extra credits for table games (up to CAD 200)

Jackpots and Cash Prizes

  • • Progressive jackpots up to CAD 100,000
  • • Weekly cash draws (up to CAD 5,000)

Special Promotions

  • • Poker tournaments with prize pools up to CAD 25,000
  • • Seasonal events: holiday raffles, summer festivals with gifts

Entertainment Perks

  • • Concerts and shows with free tickets for promo participants
  • • Themed parties featuring exclusive prizes

Popular Games at Casino New Brunswick

Casino New Brunswick offers a wide range of games to satisfy both slot enthusiasts and fans of table classics. The casino’s atmosphere is designed for every player to find their favorite — from traditional slot machines to modern video slots with stunning graphics and bonus features. Table games attract those who enjoy strategy and excitement, while the poker room is a hub for tournament lovers.


Slots hold a special place in the gaming area, featuring everything from classic fruit machines to progressive jackpots with massive payouts. Table games include popular blackjack, roulette, and baccarat, creating an authentic casino experience. Poker fans can join regular tournaments with impressive prize pools.


Every game at Casino New Brunswick comes with top-notch service and opportunities for extra bonuses, making the experience both thrilling and rewarding.


Slots

  • • Classic machines with simple rules
  • • Video slots with bonus rounds and free spins
  • • Progressive jackpots with payouts up to CAD 100,000

Poker

  • • Texas Hold’em with regular tournaments
  • • Omaha for experienced players

Table Games

  • • Blackjack — a favorite for strategy lovers
  • • Roulette — European and American versions
  • • Baccarat — elegant and exciting


Minimum and Maximum Bets at Casino New Brunswick

Casino New Brunswick offers flexible betting options for players of all levels. Minimum bets allow beginners to enjoy the games without spending much, while maximum bets provide opportunities for big wins. This applies to slot machines and table games, including blackjack, roulette, and poker. With such variety, every guest can find a comfortable betting range.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines CAD 0.01 CAD 100
Blackjack CAD 5 CAD 500
Blackjack (Live) $15.00 $500.00
Roulette CAD 2 CAD 1,000
Baccarat CAD 10 CAD 1,000
Poker (tournaments) CAD 50 buy-in Up to CAD 5,000

Events and Entertainment at Casino New Brunswick: Shows, Parties and Nightlife

Casino New Brunswick is not just about gaming; it’s a hub for vibrant events and entertainment. The resort regularly hosts concerts, themed parties, and special shows that create a festive atmosphere for guests. Its event center welcomes renowned artists, music bands, and comedy acts, turning a casino visit into a full cultural experience.


Regular entertainment programs are a highlight. Guests can enjoy live music, DJ performances, and dance parties every week. Seasonal events such as New Year’s galas, summer festivals, and holiday-themed celebrations add extra excitement, often featuring prize draws, special promotions, and exclusive offers.


For nightlife lovers, the property boasts a stylish nightclub where visitors can relax after gaming, sip cocktails, and dance until dawn. The club combines modern design with high-quality sound and lighting for an unforgettable party experience. Guests can also enjoy bars with live music and regular karaoke nights.


Casino New Brunswick focuses on making every visit thrilling and memorable. With a variety of events and shows, guests can choose their ideal way to unwind — from a cozy evening with live music to a dynamic night party.


Entertainment and Events

  • • Event Center — concerts by top artists and music bands
  • • Themed Parties — New Year’s galas, summer festivals, holiday celebrations
  • • Live Music — weekly performances in bars and lounges
  • • Nightclub — dance parties with DJs and light shows
  • • Karaoke Nights — regular programs for singing enthusiasts
  • • Special Shows — comedy acts and theatrical performances
  • • Seasonal Promotions — prize draws and giveaways during holidays

Bars, Restaurants and Relaxation at Casino New Brunswick

Casino New Brunswick is more than just a gaming destination; it’s a full-service resort offering exceptional dining and relaxation experiences. The property features stylish bars and restaurants where guests can enjoy diverse cuisine and signature drinks. Each venue combines modern design with comfort, creating the perfect setting for unwinding after gaming or meeting friends.


Special attention is given to service quality and menu variety. Restaurants serve international dishes, while bars offer creative cocktails and snacks. Sports fans can visit a bar with large screens for live broadcasts, and those seeking a calm atmosphere can relax in lounge areas with soft seating and live music.


The Casino New Brunswick hotel is a four-star property with spacious rooms, modern amenities, and a spa area. Guests can enjoy a romantic weekend, host business meetings, or simply relax after an exciting day. Hotel visitors have access to all casino services, including dining and entertainment.


Casino New Brunswick focuses on providing a complete experience: gaming, fine dining, comfortable accommodation, and vibrant leisure — all in one place.


Relaxation Spots

  • • Hub City Pub — sports bar with diverse menu and live game broadcasts
  • • Buffet Experience — buffet restaurant featuring global cuisine
  • • Lounge Areas — cozy spaces with live music and cocktails
  • • Casino New Brunswick Hotel — four-star property with rooms, spa, and fitness center

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Cash, credit, and debit cards are accepted.

items.title: What are the casino hours?
items.answer: The casino is open daily, usually from morning until late night.

items.title: Do I need to book in advance?
items.answer: No, reservations are not required, but recommended for hotel and events.

items.title: Are ATMs and currency exchange available?
items.answer: Yes, ATMs and currency exchange services are available on-site.
